column1: Image:John Howe - The Lieutenant of The Black Tower of Barad-dur.jpg - The Lieutenant of The Black Tower of Barad-dûr
Lieutenant of the Tower of Barad-dûr was the title of an important commander in the land of Mordor. Its associated details and duties are unknown
column2: but at the time of the War of the Ring it was borne by the Men known as the The Mouth of Sauron.
